entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Local blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
